alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson; Perry (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 9:20AM CDT until May 07 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL PERRY...SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON AND CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 919 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Valier, or near Benton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Benton, Christopher, Rend Lake Area, Sesser, Valier, West City, Ina, North City, Buckner, Hanaford and Ewing. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 68 and 82. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
